error-blockedInvestment: All your funds are pending to be transferred out of the service.

freeWithdrawal.description: You will receive your funds after the fund manager releases them and daily accounting is performed. Please, take into account that your investment is at risk until the balance is transferred to you. Depending on the fund manager, this usually takes a few days but may take longer to complete.

modalSuccess.title: Investment Processing (Up to 24h)
modalSuccess.description: Your funds will be transferred into the service’s account within 24 hours. You may withdraw your funds anytime before this transfer is made.

invest-modal.type-transfer: Type the word “{{word}}” in the field below to complete the transfer:
invest-modal.transfer-error: Invalid value. Please type the correct word.
invest-modal.max-funds: Exceeds maximum funds allowed in this service. Invest max. {{max}} {{coin}}.
invest-modal.max-reached: Cannot invest in this service because it has reached Maximum Funds limit.
invest-modal.i-understand-margin: I understand my whole {{coin}} balance is now part of the margin and at risk
invest-modal.i-understand-money-transferred: I understand and confirm that my funds will be transferred to the trader's pool and will no longer appear in my available balance

withdrawal-success.title: Withdrawal Requested
withdrawal-success.description: You will receive your funds after the fund manager releases them and daily accounting is performed. Please, take into account that your investment is at risk until the balance is transferred to you. Depending on the fund manager, this usually takes a few days but may take longer to complete. Zignaly does not control this time frame, so please be patient.
